item.title: Deltascape how to add a new skill video
item.dc:creator: @emtrescue emtrescue
item.description:
@emtrescue wrote:

How to add a new skil:
Difficulty 1/10 just basic concept of what I explain

  1. go to client.java and search woodcutting (figured easiest way).
    you will find public String statName[]

add your stat to the end of the line mine was “summoning”

[code] public String statName[] = { “attack”, “defence”, “strength”, “hitpoints”,
“range”, “prayer”, “magic”, “cooking”, “woodcutting”, “fletching”,
“fishing”, “firemaking”, “crafting”, “smithing”, “mining”,
“herblore”, “agility”, “thieving”, “slayer”, “farming”,
“runecrafting”,“summoning”};

[/code]2. search woodctutting again till you find

[code] if (CLWoodcutting > getLevelForXP(playerXP[8])) {
sM(“You are not a high enough level to use this item.”);
sM(“You need to have a “+statName[playerWoodcutting]+” level of “+CLWoodcutting+”.”);
GoFalse = true;
}

[/code]

add in your skill as so:

			if (CLSummoning > getLevelForXP(playerXP[21])) {
				sM("You are not a high enough level to use this item.");
				sM("You need to have a "+statName[playerSummoning]+" level of "+CLSummoning+".");
				GoFalse = true;
			}[/code]

what this does is tell the person if you dont have enough level for the skill to send that message


now search for 
[code]CLWoodcutting

you will find

int CLWoodcutting = server.Wearing.GetCLWoodcutting(wearID);

this is for wearing an item it says rather or not you have enough of that skill for me i added this

now go to player.java

search for public int playerCooking

add to the bottom of the skill list your skill for me it is

public int playerSummoning = 21;

this adds the summoning int needed for the “need leveling” in client.java

now go to wearing.java

search for

public int GetCLCrafting(int ItemID) { if (ItemID == -1) { return 1;

at the end of }

so at end of this

public int GetCLCrafting(int ItemID) { if (ItemID == -1) { return 1; } String ItemName = GetItemName(ItemID); if (ItemName.startsWith("Crafting cape")) { return 99; } if (ItemName.startsWith("Crafting hood")) { return 99; } return 1; }

add your skill like this:

public int GetCLSummoning(int ItemID) { if (ItemID == -1) { return 1; } String ItemName = GetItemName(ItemID); if (ItemName.startsWith("Summoning cape")) { return 99; } if (ItemName.startsWith("Summoning hood")) { return 99; } return 1; }

what this does is tell the server what level is needed for that certain skill an EX my summoning cape

if (ItemName.startsWith("Summoning cape"))
that is the item which is in item.cfg

than i return 99

meaning i need 99 summoning to equipd it

Read full topic
item.source: Deltascape how to add a new skill video
